sentences.en: A look of utter confusion swept across his handsome face.
sentences.cn: 他英俊的脸上掠过一丝大惑不解的神情。

sentences.en: Confusion reigned about how the debate would end.
sentences.cn: 在这一争论如何结束的问题上人们陷入了混乱。

sentences.en: His answers to my questions have only added to my confusion.
sentences.cn: 他对我的问题的回答只是使我更加困惑不解.

sentences.en: His mind was a haze of fear and confusion.
sentences.cn: 由于害怕和困惑，他当时处于一种混沌状态。

sentences.en: His people had fallen further and further into a quagmire of confusion.
sentences.cn: 他的人民在混乱不安的泥潭里越陷越深。

sentences.en: In the ensuing confusion another eight persons were hurt.
sentences.cn: 在随后的骚动中,又有八人受伤.

sentences.en: Instead, the session has sowed confusion.
sentences.cn: 相反，这次会议却引发了混乱。

sentences.en: Teddy turned to Mona with a look of mild confusion.
sentences.cn: 泰迪表情略带困惑地向莫娜求助。

sentences.en: The laws led to confusion, muddle and years of delay.
sentences.cn: 这些法律导致了困惑、混乱和数年的耽搁。

sentences.en: There is some confusion about what the correct procedure should be.
sentences.cn: 对于应该采取什么正确步骤，还是有些不明确。

sentences.en: There was some confusion as to whether we had won or lost.
sentences.cn: 我们究竟是赢是输，情况不太清楚。

sentences.en: This accident upset our plans and threw us into confusion.
sentences.cn: 这个意外事件搅乱了我的阵脚.

sentences.en: This served to hide the confusion and imprecision in their thinking.
sentences.cn: 这个被用来掩盖他们思想的混乱和不准确。

sentences.en: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.cn: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

sentences.en: to be caught in a spider's web of confusion
Use different colours of felt pen on your sketch to avoid confusion.
sentences.cn: 用不同颜色的毡头笔画草图，以免搞混。

sentences.en: We always left his office in a state of confusion.
sentences.cn: 我们总是一头雾水地离开他的办公室。
